name: Trigger Discipline
description:
Hi!

This is a prototype for a game im currently working on called Trigger Discipline. I wish to collect some feedback and see if there is any desire for such a game, and therefore hope that you will play the game, test it and give me any feedback you can think of. 

The game itself is a platforming game, where you can only move by firing your gun and using the kickback from the gun to fly where you need to. It's a simple prototype that was made in a couple of days and does not contain art and assets that would be used in the final product. 

Thanks! 

Pixelrain Studios <3
